definition: (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Your first sight of qingyuan will definitely be impressive.
sentences.chinese: 当你第一眼看见清远会立即使你眼前一亮。

sentences.english: Medusa's terrible head when i have a glance with it.
sentences.chinese: 第一眼看到这集线器就觉得像梅杜莎的笨脑袋。

sentences.english: Supremely soft and pre-loved yoga pants for that perfect look, right from the start.
sentences.chinese: 超柔软的瑜伽裤让你第一眼就选中它。

sentences.english: Kervin: Well, at first glance, your eyes are brown.
sentences.chinese: 恩，第一眼看到的时候，你的眼睛是褐色的。

sentences.english: I fell in love with her at first sight.
sentences.chinese: 看着老朱论坛我第一眼见到她就爱上了她。

sentences.english: I almost fainted when I saw him the first time!
sentences.chinese: 第一眼看到他时，我几乎晕过去了。

sentences.english: The moment the prince caught sight of the princess, he was head over heels in love with her.
sentences.chinese: 王子第一眼见到公主，就神魂颠倒地爱上了她。

sentences.english: At first glance RTM is a simple and very clean interface.
sentences.chinese: 第一眼给你的印象，RTM是一个简洁的应用接口。

sentences.english: JAF fell in love immediately with this place on the first visit.
sentences.chinese: 找食趣第一眼就爱上这个地方了。

sentences.english: The first thing he saw was Mr. McGregor hoeing onions.
sentences.chinese: 他第一眼看到的是麦格雷戈先生正在锄洋葱。

sentences.english: The first eye sees six Shis thousand.
Wake up HanShan first saw hanging in the head of a bed photos, ghastly a smile.
sentences.chinese: 睡醒的韩珊第一眼看到挂在床头照片，惨然一笑。

sentences.english: As was my routine, I glanced first toward the Cullens' table.
sentences.chinese: 如同例行公事一样，我第一眼便向卡伦家的桌子看去。

sentences.english: From see you one eye, i shit love you.
sentences.chinese: 自从看到你的第一眼，我便爱上了你。

sentences.english: This is why men watched the women at first glance, always remain in the chest.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么男人看女人时第一眼总落在胸部上。

sentences.english: You can take the first object in my room that strikes  your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 你可以拿我屋中你第一眼看到的东西。

definition: pleasing to the eye/nice to look at
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
to feel a rush of excitement (idiom)
to fascinate/to strongly attract/to obsess/to infatuate/to captivate/to enchant
able to withstand careful appreciation/well worth a second look
